casebody.data:
No. 453,

Misc.

Newsom v. Smyth, Superintendent, Virginia State Penitentiary. Petitioner pro se. A. S. Harrison, Jr., Attorney General of Virginia, and Thomas M. Miller, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Appeals of Virginia granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
